name: Electromagnetic Field Meter (EM/EMF/Gauss Gauge)
description: Measure the electromagnetic field in your enviroment Features - Measure electromagnetic field in realtime (tap value to toggle XYZ) - Generate graph of data - EM field direction indicator  Acknowledgments: Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY  SpeedometerView  GraphView
